name: CUSTOM ORDER: handknit bloom dress/tunic
description:
this is a CUSTOM ORDER for a handknitted bloom dress/tunic.  size and color preferences to be discussed via email.

knit in the softest 100% merino worsted yarn with an intricate lace border at the hem. perfect style to be worn first as a longer dress and then later as a tunic, providing years of enjoyment!

HANDWASH in COLD water only! lay flat to dry.

please allow 3 weeks for delivery.

name: CUSTOM ORDER: felted water bottle carrier with SHORT STRAP
description:
this is a CUSTOM ORDER for one of my handknitted and felted water bottle carriers with a SHORTER strap. color preferences to be discussed via email.

made with felted merino wool to naturally insulate, keeping your beverage cool or warm! will accommodate up to size 27oz klean kanteen or similar sized water bottle. be good to yourself and your environment - choose to reuse!

MACHINE washable.

please allow 2 weeks for delivery.

name: CUSTOM ORDER: felted water bottle carrier with LONG STRAP
description:
this is a CUSTOM ORDER for one of my handknitted and felted water bottle carriers with a LONG strap. color preferences to be discussed via email.

made with felted merino wool to naturally insulate, keeping your beverage cool or warm! will accommodate up to size 27oz klean kanteen or similar sized water bottle. be good to yourself and your environment - choose to reuse!

MACHINE washable.

please allow 2 weeks for delivery.

name: CUSTOM ORDER: newborn silk pilot cap in PETAL PINK
description:
this is a CUSTOM ORDER for a newborn size pilot cap knit in luxurious 100% silk, in the PETAL PINK colorway. 

silk is especially nice and appropriate for newborns and young babies. and is the perfect natural fiber for any time of year, as it is temperature sensitive and will keep your little one cool in a warm environment and warm in a cool environment. two knitted i-cord ties will keep this pilot cap style hat securely in place.

head circumference of 13”-15” (33-38cm), please measure your baby's head to ensure a proper fit.

HANDWASH gently in cool water, lay flat to dry.

please allow 2 weeks for delivery.
